description:
This new endgame "Challenge Mode" pits you and up to 3 others against six bosses one after another--and of course comes with new customization parts, 15 in total.

The bosses that blocked your way in the Story Mode are stronger than ever in Glitch Busters: Stuck on You. Show off your magnet and shooting skills by challenging the most difficult mode in the game's history solo or with your friends.

Take your Glitchless fashion to the next level with new demonic accessories, adorable faces, monotone suits and more.
name: Glitch Busters: Boss Challenge Pack
